pull.title: Make mapBlockIndex and chainActive and all CBlockIndex*es const outside of validation/CChainState
pull.body: This is based on #10279 and is all just pretty mechanical (largely scripted) changes to make mapBlockIndex/chainActive/CBlockIndex*es const outside of validation.cpp/CChainState!

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message: Make DisconnectBlock unaware of where undo data resides on disk
Move txindex/undo data disk location stuff out of ConnectBlock
Move block writing out of AcceptBlock
Create initial CChainState to hold chain state information
Move some additional variables into CChainState private
Avoid calling GetSerializeSize on each tx in a block if !fTxIndex
Expose const CBlockIndexes in validation.h, update wallet rescan
Use const CBlockIndex* instead of const_cast in qt/clientmodel

scripted-diff: constify CBlockIndex* outside of validation

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i "s/\(const \)*CBlockIndex/const CBlockIndex/" src/qt/transactionrecord.cpp src/rest.cpp src/miner.cpp src/init.cpp src/rpc/*.cpp src/wallet/*.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

scripted-diff: Use BlockMap::const_iterators outside of validation

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i "s/BlockMap::iterator/BlockMap::const_iterator/" src/rpc/*.cpp src/wallet/*.cpp src/qt/transactionrecord.cpp src/net_processing.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

scripted-diff: mapBlockIndex[] -> .at outside of validation

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i "s/mapBlockIndex\[\(.*\)\]/mapBlockIndex.at(\1)/g" src/rest.cpp src/wallet/*.cpp src/rpc/*.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
Move mapBlockIndex cleanup inside CChainState
Move chainActive tip setting into CChainState from LoadBlockIndexDB
Make mapBlockIndex const in validation.h
Create new "NonConstBlockMap" typdef for CChainState

scripted-diff: Use NonConstBlockMap type for validation iterators

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i "s/BlockMap::iterator/NonConstBlockMap::iterator/" src/validation.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
Move NonConstBlockMap into CChainState
Make mapBlockIndex's CBlockIndex* const outside of CChainState
Make some CBlockIndex*s in validation const where appropriate
Make some CBlockIndex*es in wallet_tests const
Add a const_cast'ed reference to chainActive in miner_tests

scripted-diff: Use nonCosntChainActive in miner_tests

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i "s/chainActive\./nonConstChainActive./" src/test/miner_tests.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
Make VerifyDB a CChainState member instead of a loose class
Use chainstate's CBlockIndexes in sequence lock calculation
Make CChain only return const CBlockIndex* in const functions
Make chainActive and pindexBestHeader const CBlockIndex*s
